actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of August 13, 1946, to increase the Federal contribution to 90 per centum of the cost of shore restoration and protection projects.

summary.text: Amends an Act authorizing Federal participation in the cost of protecting the shores of publicly owned property to increase the maximum Federal contribution from 50 percent to 90 percent of the cost of the project.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of August 13, 1946, to increase the Federal contribution to 90 per centum of the cost of shore restoration and protection projects.
